description: Unlike earlier avant-garde movements, which aimed to narrow the gap between art and everyday life, Pop Art was the first to fully engage with the cultural landscape as it was.
title: Charting the Legacy of Pop Art in the Work of Derrick Adams, Mickalene Thomas and Tomokazu Matsuyama

description: In short, the organization supports artists and artist estates with challenging legacy needs.
title: With Soft Network, the Experimental Artists of the Past Get a New Life

description: The new building will have galleries with varied proportions, scales and floor treatments to accommodate a wider variety of artworks.
title: Director Thelma Golden On the Future of Programming at the Studio Museum in Harlem

description: The 'Scream' actress has made a name for herself in horror, but this new Halloween rom-com shows a different side of her, from musical talents to comedic chops.
title: Melissa Barrera Talks Scream Queen Status and Sweater Weather in ‘Your Monster’

description: Yi’s concept of the “biologized machine” is strikingly manifested here.
title: Anicka Yi Envisions Symbiosis Between the Human and Non-Human in Her Show at Seoul’s Leeum Museum

description: The disappointing 'Venom: The Last Dance' races through action and exposition at breakneck speed. Things simply happen, one after another, with no anticipation or suspense.
title: ‘Venom: The Last Dance’ Review: Brainless and Disjointed

description: From heritage penny loafers to Italian designer picks, these 20 pairs of loafers prove boots aren't the only answer to autumn style.
title: Fall’s Secret Weapon: Why Loafers Are This Season’s Power Move

description: The latest Survey of Global Collecting offers insights at a time when the art market is undergoing major shifts in transaction channels, demographics and buying habits.
title: Art Basel and UBS Data Show Market Stability Despite Declines in Collector Spending

description: The sea urchin spaghetti is a classic Santa Barbara dish that locals will love, but chef Brandon Boudet expects the chicory, manchego, pecan, date and sherry vinaigrette salad to become a signature Bar Lou item.
title: Bar Lou Brings Flavors of the French Riviera to Montecito

description: As Christopher Nolan's 'Interstellar' marks its 10th anniversary, its bleak vision feels both more relevant and closer at hand than ever.
title: Christopher Nolan’s ‘Interstellar’ Ten Years Later: Climate Change as a Hero’s Journey

description: With more than 55 million people worldwide living with dementia, the need for innovative support systems has never been more pressing.
title: Lenovo Unveils a Photorealistic A.I. Avatar Designed to Help Dementia Patients

description: Characters vape, gender is fluid, desire bi, and death assured in director Sam Gold's hyperpop reimagining of 'Romeo + Juliet.'
title: Review: Juliet Is Fire, Romeo Got Mad Rizz In This Shakespeare Glowup
